blocks.name: rhmfn
blocks.content: The mapping of two rings to the ring homomorphisms between them is a function. (Contributed by AV, 1-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: rhmval
blocks.content: The ring homomorphisms between two rings. (Contributed by AV, 1-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rhmval(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wceq(co(c0, crh, c1), cin(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)))))
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, crh, c1, cin(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))), crg, crg, cin(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)))), universe, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wceq(crh, cmpo(hs0, hs1, crg, crg, cin(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)))))))
  dfrhm2(hs0, hs1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(cin(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)))), cin(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)))))
  ineq12d(co(cv(hs0), cghm, cv(hs1)), co(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1))), co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1), c1, cghm)
  oveqan12d(cfv(cmgp, cv(hs0)), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, cv(hs1)), cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cmgp)
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cmgp)
  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)), wcel(cin(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))), universe))
  inex1(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1)))
  ovex(c0, cghm, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cin(co(c0, cghm, c1), co(cfv(cmgp, c0), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c1))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rhmval(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring)‚Üí(c0[RingHom]c1)=((c0[GrpHom]c1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1))))
} = {
  ovmpt2d(hs0, hs1, c0, crh, c1, ((c0[GrpHom]c1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1))), crg, crg, ((hs0[GrpHom]hs1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` hs0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` hs1))), universe, (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring), RingHom =(hs0 ‚àà Ring, hs1 ‚àà Ring ‚Ü¶((hs0[GrpHom]hs1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` hs0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` hs1)))))
  dfrhm2(hs0, hs1)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1), ((hs0[GrpHom]hs1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` hs0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` hs1)))=((c0[GrpHom]c1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1))))
  ineq12d((hs0[GrpHom]hs1), ((mulGrp ` hs0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` hs1)), (c0[GrpHom]c1), ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c1))
  oveq12(hs0, c0, hs1, c1, cghm)
  oveqan12d((mulGrp ` hs0), cmhm, (mulGrp ` hs1), (mulGrp ` c0), (mulGrp ` c1), hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cmgp)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cmgp)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Ring)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Ring)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring), ((c0[GrpHom]c1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1)))‚àà ùïå)
  inex1((c0[GrpHom]c1), ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1)))
  ovex(c0, cghm, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(((c0[GrpHom]c1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(((c0[GrpHom]c1)‚ãÇ((mulGrp ` c0)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c1))))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c1 ‚àà Ring))
}

blocks.name: rhmisrnghm
blocks.content: Each unital ring homomorphism is a non-unital ring homomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 29-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rhmisrnghm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, crngh, c2)))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, co(c1, crh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, crngh, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))))), wa(wa(wcel(c1, crng), wcel(c2, crng)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmgmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))))))
  anim12i(wa(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2)))), wa(wcel(c1, crng), wcel(c2, crng)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmgmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2)))))
  anim12i(wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c2, crg), wcel(c1, crng), wcel(c2, crng))
  ringrng(c1)
  ringrng(c2)
  anim2i(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))), wcel(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, c1), cmgmhm, cfv(cmgp, c2))))
  mhmismgmhm(c0, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))
  isrhm(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))
  isrnghmmul(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cmgp, c1), cfv(cmgp, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rhmisrnghm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2)‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2))
} = {
  3imtr4i(c0 ‚àà(c1[RingHom]c2), c0 ‚àà(c1[RngHomo]c2), ((c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c2 ‚àà Ring)‚àß(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c2)))), ((c1 ‚àà Rng ‚àß c2 ‚àà Rng)‚àß(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MgmHom](mulGrp ` c2)))))
  anim12i((c1 ‚àà Ring ‚àß c2 ‚àà Ring), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c2))), (c1 ‚àà Rng ‚àß c2 ‚àà Rng), (c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2)‚àß c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MgmHom](mulGrp ` c2))))
  anim12i(c1 ‚àà Ring, c2 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà Rng, c2 ‚àà Rng)
  ringrng(c1)
  ringrng(c2)
  anim2i(c0 ‚àà(c1[GrpHom]c2), c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MndHom](mulGrp ` c2)), c0 ‚àà((mulGrp ` c1)[MgmHom](mulGrp ` c2)))
  mhmismgmhm(c0, (mulGrp ` c1), (mulGrp ` c2))
  isrhm(c0, c1, c2, (mulGrp ` c1), (mulGrp ` c2))
  isrnghmmul(c0, c1, c2, (mulGrp ` c1), (mulGrp ` c2))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c1))
  eqid((mulGrp ` c2))
}
